snippet.title: Luigi's Mansion Beta Restoration(+) - Release Trailer (Halloween 2023 Build)
snippet.description:
Join my discord to download my mods

► Visit My Discord - https://discord.gg/7ZUZjTSK7v

► Visit My 1$ Patreon - https://tinyurl.com/tjjsyzj2

► Visit My Twitter - https://tinyurl.com/5cnptcr8

► Visit My Twitch - https://tinyurl.com/jtmj4nb4

Ever wondered what Luigi's Mansion would be like had it released at an earlier date? Well this is the experience for you. Witness Luigi's Latest adventure on the Nintendo Gamecube, with a twist, Luigi's Mansion has been completely reworked from the ground up to give you an experience like no other, coupled with all of the original features from the previous iteration of Luigi's Mansion Beta Restoration, LMBR+ strives to go even further beyond with updated accuracy, brand new rooms, new bosses, mechanics, and everything under the moon, in the style of the E3 2001 Luigi's Mansion Demo build. I have taken this title and personally given it a ton of my time and attention to detail in a way I have never done before with any game. Can Luigi rescue his brother and escape the famous haunted house in time? Find out, in Luigi's Mansion Beta Restoration PLUS(+)

The demo will be releasing this Halloween exclusively on my Discord Server, The demo will include a fully fleshed out Area 1 + Area 2. Bugs may be present so be sure to report them on the Discord in the bug-reports channel so that I can get to fixing them.

Special thanks to LMFinish, he has helped with many various things on the project alongside me.

LMFinish's Channel: @LMFinish
